overview: Four couples expand their erotic adventurism in these sensual yet scorching tales. A Japanese exchange student demonstrates some odd cultural erotic hab-its. A woman gives in to her urges for an intimate encounter with another woman. Another woman recalls the time she was seduced by a French chef baking pasties that lead to a delectable sexual recipe. And a man gave his lovely wife the gift of enjoying two men at the same time.
title: Erotic Encounters 2
